name="Contact" type="demo:ContactType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ContactType"> <sequence> <element name="ContactName" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ContactPhone" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ContactEmail" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductType"> <sequence> <element name="ProductId" type="int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ProductFamily" type="demo:ProductFamilyType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ProductName" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <minLength value="3"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="ProductPrice" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="double"> <minExclusive value="0"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="ProductFamilyType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Electronics"/> <enumeration value="Furniture"/> <enumeration value="Office"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="ProductOrderType"> <sequence> <element name="ItemRef" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <minLength value="1"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="ProductId" type="int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="Quantity" type="int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ItemDiscount" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <simpleType> <restriction base="double"> <minExclusive value="0"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderType"> <sequence> <element name="OrderRef" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="OrderDate" type="date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="Client" type="int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="Items" type="demo:ProductOrderType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="GlobalDiscount" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderReviewType"> <sequence> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="SalesRepresentative" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="Decision" type="demo:ReviewType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderReview" type="demo:SalesOrderReviewType"/> <complexType name="SalesManagementType"> <sequence> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="SalesRep" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="RevieweManager" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ReviewDecision" type="demo:ReviewType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesManagement" type="demo:SalesManagementType"/> <simpleType name="ReviewType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Approve"/> <enumeration value="Return"/> <enumeration value="Reject"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="ProductOrderDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="ItemRef" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ProductId" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ProductFamily" type="demo:ProductFamilyType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ProductName" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ProductPrice" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="Quantity" type="int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ItemDiscount" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ItemPrice" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="OrderRef" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="OrderDate" type="date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="Client" type="demo:ClientDetailType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="Items" type="demo:ProductOrderDetailType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="GlobalDiscount" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="TotalPrice" type="double" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderDetail" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType"/> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderType"/> <complexType name="ClientDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="ClientId" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ClientName" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ContactName" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ContactPhone" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="ContactEmail" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="AcknowledgeType"> <sequence> <element name="ProcessInstance" type="string"/> <element name="Timestamp" type="dateTime"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="UserDataType"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="string"/> <element name="Email" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="NotificationType"> <sequence> <element name="Role" type="string"/> <element name="Subject" type="string"/> <element name="TaskId" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="UserData" type="demo:UserDataType"/> <element name="Username" type="string"/> <complexType name="SalesOrderModType"> <sequence> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></element> <element name="ReviewManager" type="string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderMod" type="demo:SalesOrderModType"/> <complexType name="SalesOrderSplitType"> <sequence> <element name="OrderRef" type="string"/> <element name="OrderDate" type="date"/> <element name="ClientId" type="int"/> <element name="Items" type="demo:ProductOrderDetailType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderByFamilyType"> <sequence> <element name="Office" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> <element name="Furniture" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> <element name="Electronics" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderByFamily" type="demo:SalesOrderByFamilyType"></element> <complexType name="OfficeRequestType"> <sequence> <element name="OfficeOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="FurnitureRequestType"> <sequence> <element name="FurnitureOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ElectronicsRequestType"> <sequence> <element name="ElectronicsOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="OfficeRequest" type="demo:OfficeRequestType"/> <element name="Acknowledge" type="demo:AcknowledgeType"/> <complexType name="OfficeOrderProvisioned"> <sequence> <element name="OfficeOrder" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ElectronicsOrderProvisioned"> <sequence> <element name="ElectronicsOrder" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="FurnitureOrderProvisioned"> <sequence> <element name="FurnitureOrder" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderProgressType"> <sequence> <element name="SalesOrderRef" type="string"/> <element name="ClientId" type="string"/> <element name="ClientName" type="string"/> <element name="Status" type="string"/> <element name="LastUpdate" type="dateTime"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderProgress" type="demo:SalesOrderProgressType"></element> </schema>

type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType"/> <element name="SalesRepresentative" type="string"/> <element name="Decision" type="demo:ReviewType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderReview" type="demo:SalesOrderReviewType"/> <complexType name="SalesManagementType"> <sequence> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType"/> <element name="SalesRep" type="string"/> <element name="RevieweManager" type="string"/> <element name="ReviewDecision" type="demo:ReviewType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesManagement" type="demo:SalesManagementType"/> <simpleType name="ReviewType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Approve"/> <enumeration value="Return"/> <enumeration value="Reject"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="ProductOrderDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="ItemRef" type="string"/> <element name="ProductId" type="string"/> <element name="ProductFamily" type="demo:ProductFamilyType"/> <element type="double"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="OrderRef" type="string"/> <element name="OrderDate" type="date"/> <element name="Client" type="demo:ClientDetailType"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Items" type="demo:ProductOrderDetailType"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="GlobalDiscount" type="double"/> <element name="TotalPrice" type="double"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderDetail" type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType"/> <element name="SalesOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderType"/> <complexType name="ClientDetailType"> <sequence> <element name="ClientId" type="string"/> <element name="ClientName" type="string"/> <element name="ContactName" type="string"/> <element name="ContactPhone" type="string"/> <element name="ContactEmail" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="AcknowledgeType"> <sequence> <element name="ProcessInstance" type="string"/> <element name="Timestamp" type="dateTime"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="UserDataType"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="string"/> <element name="Email" type="string"/> </sequence> type="demo:SalesOrderDetailType"/> <element name="ReviewManager" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderMod" type="demo:SalesOrderModType"/> <complexType name="SalesOrderSplitType"> <sequence> <element name="OrderRef" type="string"/> <element name="OrderDate" type="date"/> <element name="ClientId" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Items" type="demo:ProductOrderDetailType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderByFamilyType"> <sequence> <element name="Office" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> <element name="Furniture" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> <element name="Electronics" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="SalesOrderByFamily" type="demo:SalesOrderByFamilyType"/> <complexType name="OfficeRequestType"> <sequence> <element name="OfficeOrder" type="demo:SalesOrderSplitType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SalesOrderProgress" type="demo:SalesOrderProgressType"/> </schema>
